sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Migrate workspace schedule content</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function migrateContent() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_cd_content_visibility');
	
	if (!gr.isValidField('page_element'))
		return;
	
	gs.info('Starting migration of content page_element field to content_identifier.');

	gr.addQuery('content_location', 'workspace');
	gr.addNotNullQuery('page_element');
	gr.query();

	while (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue('content_identifier', gr.getValue('page_element'));
		success = gr.update();
		if (!success)
			gs.error('Failed to migrate page_element value for content record: ' + gr.getUniqueValue());
	}
	
	gs.info('Done migrating content.');
}

migrateContent();
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-12-06 23:30:36</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6b3beab1c8210010fa9b4c293f3cf8ef</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Migrate workspace schedule content</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">b26210490b7203008cd6e7ae37673a6a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">b26210490b7203008cd6e7ae37673a6a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6b3beab1c8210010fa9b4c293f3cf8ef</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-12-09 17:03:04</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
